mapper.sql: ID, BALANCE, SETTLE_BALANCE, SETTLE_TIME, WITHDRAWING, CASHBACK, CASHBACKING, DEPOSIT, DEPOSIT_USED, MODIFIED_TIMESTAMP
mapper.insert: insert into AFC_ACCOUNT (ID, BALANCE, SETTLE_BALANCE, SETTLE_TIME, WITHDRAWING, CASHBACK, CASHBACKING, DEPOSIT, DEPOSIT_USED, MODIFIED_TIMESTAMP) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{settleBalance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{settleTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{withdrawing,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cashback,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cashbacking,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{depositUsed,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{modifiedTimestamp,jdbcType=BIGINT})

insert into AFC_ACCOUNT
ID,
BALANCE,
SETTLE_BALANCE,
SETTLE_TIME,
WITHDRAWING,
CASHBACK,
CASHBACKING,

mapper.update:
update AFC_ACCOUNT
BALANCE = #{balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SETTLE_BALANCE = #{settleBalance,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SETTLE_TIME = #{settleTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
WITHDRAWING = #{withdrawing,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CASHBACK = #{cashback,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CASHBACKING = #{cashbacking,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DEPOSIT = #{deposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DEPOSIT_USED = #{depositUsed,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MODIFIED_TIMESTAMP = #{modifiedTimestamp,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update AFC_ACCOUNT set BALANCE = #{balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SETTLE_BALANCE = #{settleBalance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SETTLE_TIME = #{settleTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, WITHDRAWING = #{withdrawing,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CASHBACK = #{cashback,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CASHBACKING = #{cashbacking,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DEPOSIT = #{deposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DEPOSIT_USED = #{depositUsed,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MODIFIED_TIMESTAMP = #{modifiedTimestamp,jdbcType=BIGINT} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select ID, BALANCE, SETTLE_BALANCE, SETTLE_TIME, WITHDRAWING, CASHBACK, CASHBACKING, DEPOSIT, DEPOSIT_USED, MODIFIED_TIMESTAMP from AFC_ACCOUNT
